Reviews.Title: Excellent tablet give it 5 stars
Reviews.Author: JUSTO ESTABA
Reviews.Content: Arrived at time...fast response...sensitive touchscreen...great screen resolution...playstore preinstalled with lots of apps..solid and well built...at first I thought it would be another cheap chinese slow tab but I am really impressed... so far working great...a real low price for so much... congratulations afunta guys... give it 5

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Stelios Georgiou
Reviews.Content: got it in time no problems so far tried other brands and was not happy untill i found this one

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Brian T.
Reviews.Content: it's ok. had a good picture to it. i like it. it was my first tablet. still would like to have a better one.

Reviews.Title: I love this tablet!
Reviews.Author: MCMICHAEL C.
Reviews.Content: So I was interested in getting a tablet for a little money but also wanted it to do a lot so I kind of thought I was reaching for the stars. I looked on amazon and saw one from Pyle astro (PTBL92BC) which was a 9 inch tablet for 69.99 I was excited then it arrived it had really low resolution and the worst response to touches and I thought man this tablet is not for me none of the apps I wanted didnt work (the wwe app) I couldn't blame myself because I didn't do any research it was just a bad impulse buy. So I looked on amazon again trying to redeem myself I was still looking to spend a little money and wanting it to do a lot then I ran across the Afunta 10 inch tablet it had everything I wanted Bluetooth 1 gig of ram and an HDMI port and a good resolution so I bought it. I arrived on Sunday I turned it on and was surprised it had a 100% battery life I really liked it and most importantly the wwe app worked So overall this tablet is a really good inexpensive device I'm very happy with my purchase and Ill definitely recommend it to a friend
